title: Goa PSC Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Assistant Director, Lecturer Posts
description: The Goa Public Service Commission (GPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Assistant Director, Lecturer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Civil and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the Goa PSC Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the educa...
